p2: An employee shall not be required under his contract of service to work:
p3: 1. For more than five consecutive hours without a period of leisure of not less than 30 minutes.
p4: 2. For more than eight hours in one day.
p5: 3. For more than 45 hours in one week (excluding meal time).
p6: [Section 59 (1)] Employees shall be allowed each week a rest day of one whole day.
